website_summaries.verdict: The most affordable option if you want reusable marshmallow roasting sticks.
pros: Each stick is marked with a different color and they are lightweight enough for young children to use
Available for a great price for 8 sticks
cons: These sticks extend to 32 inches, which is shorter than many other brands

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: These work great for roasting marshmallows and hotdogs over our camp fire. The handles extend out and are very sturdy when cooking over the fire. The kids love they have there own stick and can choice there favorite color. Easy to clean and stores great in the carrying pouch that comes with them.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaF1224

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: We Already Had like 5 of another kind.. but we were throwing my daughter a 10th birthday glow party and the finale was a bonfire in our backyard. We Were Set To Have Like 24 kids so I needed to add more roasting sticks to the Rotation! These Are Super Cute And Colorful. They Extend of Course.. and I love how they come in a nice and durable cloth bag to store them in! Wish The First Set Came With That.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn Gordon

customer_reviews.title: STOP!!! Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a high school graduation party and could not be happier with them. If they can hold up to a bunch of teenagers making s'mores over a fire pit for several hours, they can handle anything. These are very sturdy and, for some reason, much, much easier to clean than others we have purchased. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Boone

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a firepit night!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for roasting marshmallows and hot dogs by the Fire pit. They are easy to store because they are small, but can expand up to 3 ft. when in use. The color coding is handy, especially for kids, they can pick their color and can keep track of their own stick all night.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P-M

customer_reviews.title: A fun compact tool to keep on hand for S'mores night
customer_reviews.text: These are a hit! The two prongs safely keep 1-4 large marshmallows secured. The sticks extend out plenty far enough that the little ones won't catch fire or have a piece of clothing drop into a flame. When we are all done for the night, we wipe down the sticks, shrink them down, put them into the little black storage bag, and slip them into a tiny crevasse of the appliance cabinet. When friends and family are over, we get so many compliments about how handy and cute these are!
customer_reviews.author: Megsreview

customer_reviews.title: Only Lasted 24hours
customer_reviews.text: Received Friday, it’s now Saturday and they are all in pieces. They all broke so easily. You pull the stick out and they fall apart. Junk. I only gave it two stars because it came in a carrying bag and they looked good upon opening but they lasted 24hours
customer_reviews.author: plantbasedmom

customer_reviews.title: Great roasting sticks.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy once extended. I had purchased a different set locally (on clearance) which is a little flimsy. These are sturdy for hot links, pretty, and yeah--just great. I'd recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: PokaDots

customer_reviews.title: Love the multi colors for my kids
customer_reviews.text: They look to be an all right quality. When fully extended, they do get a bit wobbly. Given that my kids will be using these, I hope they'll last us a few seasons. The prongs seem too close together to roast one hotdog on each prong, but would be just fine for marshmallows. All in all, happy with what I got for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crazy small.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. What a disappointment. The main/first picture shown is misleading. The prongs are actually smaller than the handle and the handle is small. I am a small female and my hand barely fits on the handle. Imagine squeezing two marshmallows together on a stick, that’s about the size and that is all that will fit on the prongs. I suppose these would be good for small children. That are very small and light. I wanted something more considerable for young adults.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Q

customer_reviews.title: Great for marshmallows!
customer_reviews.text: We bought just for marshmallows and they are perfect! Easy to use, easier to clean. The gooey stuff wiped right off. They don't technically rotate like other reviewers said but for the price, I wouldn't expect them to. Plus it isn't hard to just spin the handle myself, lol! We had mostly children using them and they didn't destroy them so they are definitely sturdy enough for kids to roast marshmallows. They do feel a little cheaply made so I don't know if they'd stand up to heavier foods like hot dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Sydkidinla

customer_reviews.title: Very handy to keep in the RV or kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs a set of these to have on hand in your RV or just the kitchen. Great for roasting marshmallows to make s'mores, that's what we use them for. Really long handles so even the grandkids aren't afraid of getting too close to the fire. At home we use them after we've cooked out and are done with dinner to roast marshmallows over the embers on the grill, they work great there too, no need for a campfire!
customer_reviews.author: Tony J

customer_reviews.title: Works well for marshmallows
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to go camping with to roast marshmallows and hot dogs. I was great for the marshmallows, but the hot dogs were to heavy for them, the rod bent to the point I thought it would break. Because of the bend in the rod it was difficult to rotate the hot dog. Also, when we attempted to rotate some of them would just spin the telescoping rods.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Carrying case came with holes - sticks look good.
customer_reviews.text: I got this today and can’t wait to use these to roast marshmallows at our New Years cabin! The sticks themselves look great and are so easy to use. They extend really well and will keep you safe and as close or far as you want around the fire. Unfortunately the bag has holes and loose threads all around it and I’m afraid it won’t stay together for long. I got this set because of the carrying case and how handy it would be to pack, but the case is in rough condition and won’t be useable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to BBQ meat skewers!
customer_reviews.text: We got these to bbq meat skewers after buying countless single use bamboo sticks. These are perfect for what we use them do and feel like they are high quality. This set comes with a convenient carrying pouch for storage. Each of the 8 sticks have different colored knobs so everyone can pick their favorite colors!
customer_reviews.author: Ray W

customer_reviews.title: Good price to roast the marshmellows.
customer_reviews.text: Roast marshmellows from further away! Roast hot dogs from the same distance! Make sure to put both prongs through the hotdog otherwise it will spin and fall off. I would recommend 2 hot dogs on here at most, any more causes it to bend in a way where you think it'll break.
customer_reviews.author: D. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: These marshmallow roasting sticks are great! They telescope to give you the ability to store them in a small space but expand them to reach the heat while you stay at a distance. They have different colors so people can tell which is theirs. And they come with a sturdy storage bag for easy poke-less storage. I'd highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: J Salcedo

customer_reviews.title: Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice! They telescope, so they’re long enough to reach the fire without getting burned. Color coded so you know which one is yours. I bought a set for myself, both my kids, my sister & my nephew. Everybody loved them !!
customer_reviews.author: judy maier

customer_reviews.title: Great roasting sticks
customer_reviews.text: We don't have a great use for roasting sticks- so I didn't want to spend a lot- or worry about storing them. We have a lake home where tree branches are hard to come by. - these will be perfect. 4 stars because they seem flimsy when they are fully extended-
customer_reviews.author: Bright spot

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect them to last
customer_reviews.text: Pros: nice carrying case and the sticks retract to a small size. Cons: used two sticks so far. 1 stick broke after being used for a few marshmallows. Based on my use to price factor, I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: TNash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer bbqs
customer_reviews.text: I love that these sticks collapse down into a manageable storage size and that they come with their own bag. These have been great for my family roasting marshmallows, hotdogs and sausages. They have been used several times and will be used all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Lorilee S

customer_reviews.title: Did the job, could be more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set to use for a camping trip. They did the job but weren't very sturdy. We roasted marshmallows and it worked fine, but when we roasted hot dogs you could see the roasting stick had a visible bow. It worked out just fine, but I definitely would have preferred something a little more sturdy. I'll definitely use them again but when it comes time to replace them I'll look for something with more reinforcement.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Never get burned
customer_reviews.text: our guests loved them and they were very easy to use as well as clean. Husband thought they were super cool because they extended. My neighbor liked them so much she bought the same ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T.

customer_reviews.title: Forks are the way to go...
customer_reviews.text: These forks are much more useful than roasting sticks for marshmallows (smore's), hot dogs and whatever. The teloscopic feature works like a car antenna. It's sturdy. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Bill2012

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making Smores
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these I didn't realize exactly how NICE they are!!!!! They are PERFECT for making Smores around the campfire!!!! I absolutely LOVE them!!!! One thing that I really LOVE because of kids using them they are not sharp and I don't have to worry about that!! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Koeller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the Aoocan marshmallows roasting sticks! They are a perfect sturdiness for adults and children! Easy to clean and the children could roast marshmallows on their favorite colored stick!
customer_reviews.author: Grandmax7

customer_reviews.title: These are great for campfires
customer_reviews.text: These are great for campfires! They work well for marshmallows or hotdogs, and are easy to clean and store. They are lightweight, but have held up fine. We have some other roasting sticks that are thicker and heavier, but these have not broken and are so easy to collapse and store that I would highly recommend. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Weis

customer_reviews.title: Helpful extension
customer_reviews.text: I don't want my grandchildren close to the fire, so I appreciate the 36" extension. We've used the sticks several times and they work well. The appreciate the color choices, and I appreciate the blunt ends. Kids are exactly careful where they're aiming the sticks.
customer_reviews.author: TeriG

customer_reviews.title: Great product but do not rotate
customer_reviews.text: Description says they rotate. They do not. I have another one that I bought elsewhere that you can hold the stick and rotate it with your thumb with the plastic piece at the top. All and all a decent product. Just not exactly what was described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful and Safe For Kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Roasting sticks they come in their own little storage bag, easy to clean and the ends aren't pointy like most so I trusted my 3 year old to roast her own hot dog with my help but her holding the stick! Best part they extend to full length and super easy to clean and store!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect concept, easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: These are just what we needed to get more fun out of our fire pit. I love the telescoping handles, the different colored collars and the whole concept. Nicely done.
customer_reviews.author: whereverigo

customer_reviews.title: Great for roasting anything over the fire
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome for the camping trip. Use them to roast hot dogs, little smokies, marshmellows etc... They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and packaging here.
customer_reviews.text: These marshmallow roasting utensils have been perfect for making hotdogs and smores on our beach bonfires . Sturdy and easy to clean!These are perfect for our family! The kiddos love them! I would purchase another set. I would say that they're very similar to a radio antenna and that you wouldn't want to bend it or it probably would fold any longer. Comes in a really nice little bag. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaRussell

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift idea! I bought to make s’mores and they worked perfectly. Not terrible to clean but takes a little elbow grease.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Widom

customer_reviews.title: are easy to clean (they stain in the fire
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Not much else to say! They've lasted over a dozen s'mores parties, are easy to clean (they stain in the fire, but what doesn't), and they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: So handy and easy to store! I love these! But dont "burn off" the marshmallow goo. You wont be able to get it off and it will damage it. Also, they're a bit flimsy but with a little care they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Broke several, but the ones that lived, worked. Ended up throwing them out because kids got marshmallows in the extensions.
customer_reviews.author: Mulysa ✨

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase them again
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. Easy to site because they are telescopic. Could be sturdier. Not the easiest to clean. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Thorson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for marshmallow roasting
customer_reviews.text: we finally were able to use these skewers and forks and they were great!! best marshmallow roasting sticks we have used,There are cheaper options, there are probably longer and even more sturdy options. But the fact these colapse is clutch. Makes packing them in the car and storing them at home so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K Davenportt

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one!
customer_reviews.text: These are not rotating sticks. The plastic knob does not spin, I am sending my set back. Also the package I received was clearly a return as it was ripped on the inside of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: B. Steel

customer_reviews.title: These work pretty well for making marshmallows or cooking hot dogs over ...
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well for making marshmallows or cooking hot dogs over the campfire. I like the collapsable stick, as they're super easy to transport. The only catch is that they're really flimsy and one of them broke off the handle the first time we tried to use it. If you're really careful with them, they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect marshmallows
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to enjoying these with family for both outdoor cooking and toasting marshmallows over the fireplace, grill and fire pit!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Anne Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Good - but maybe change the product name?
customer_reviews.text: The product name states "Aoocan Marshmallow Roasting Sticks Telescoping Rotating Smores Skewers Hot Dog - 32 inches - Set of 8 Smores Sticks for fire Pit, Campfire, Camping, Bonfire and Grill" - was looking specifically for skewers that rotated, and while these are great roasting sticks they don't actually rotate.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love the different colors, kids can Choose their favorite, so worth it. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Very happily pleased with the quality and appearance of this item. Used with ease by adults and children alike. Comes in a sturdy and attractive storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Russell

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Okay marshmallow roaster. I prefer the more sturdy ones from Walmart. One of these snapped in half at our first campsite and the other one looks like as posted, after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Great color coded Marshmallow Sticks
customer_reviews.text: These marshmallow forks are lightweight and easy to use feeling cheap. I used these at my rehearsal dinner, there were adults and kids and they all used it without any issues. They collapse so it's super easy to store and it's color coded if people get a little possessive over "their" stick. My 7-year-old was able to roast her own marshmallows and hot dogs with no difficulty. All 8 fit perfectly in the storage pouch so they can be packed up with the rest of our camping gear.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Blumm

customer_reviews.title: Great and kids love it
customer_reviews.text: We used several times, for hot dogs and s’mores and still firm and good. Looks a bit iffy first but it is actually awesome ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C.

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a roosting stick like our old cabin has from the olden days. Something tough, sturdy, and will last generations. These aren't.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Long Enough to Not Get Burned
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderfully long!! They are great for roasting marshmallows over a fire. They also come in a nice cloth zipper case.
customer_reviews.author: DebinNC

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the big package of these. I prefer the telescoping sticks because they pack up well in camping gear bins.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleT

customer_reviews.title: Better than other roasting sticks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this roasting sticks last week, I am very satisfied with them. They are light weight yet sturdy. Besides marshmallows, you can use them to roast hot dogs and vegetables. They can be extended far, so I don't have to worry about my kids getting too close to the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Levi K.

customer_reviews.title: Can be extended Very long!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping is fast,arrived 2nd day of ordering together with another order. It can be extend very long, so should be fine for camping fires!
customer_reviews.author: pkuhuowei

customer_reviews.title: Hard to rotate. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: They are extremely difficult to turn with the rotating plastic knob; defeats the purpose of a roasting stick...
customer_reviews.author: Shayne

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I love that the length is adjustable. We used these all summer and every one of my son’s friends, neighbor kids, family, etc loves these for making s’mores. These are a great buy for 10 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Finally didn't have to go searching for sticks long enough to not burn ourselves roasting marshmallows at the lake this year. And the two prongs kept our marshmallows from turning around and slipping off into the coals.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Fun and handy skewers
customer_reviews.text: They are great for the family. My kids and I decorated our handles with permanent markers, putting everyones name on individual skewers. They are good enough for throwing in the camper or using in your back yard and they come in a handy little storage sack. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kraemerskeeper

customer_reviews.title: good looking functional set
customer_reviews.text: This set looks so good, love the colors the length and the little storage
customer_reviews.author: Ani N

customer_reviews.title: Very small and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected and though I did not have high expectations for the quality, these still disappointed. I would be very surprised if I get more than a couple of uses out of these.
customer_reviews.author: JDB

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I just didn't end up needing them ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I just didn't end up needing them for my event! Would definitely recommend though as the quality was good and the price was reasonable. I also appreciated the easy return process. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome s’mores sticks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these roasting sticks to make s'mores. They were exactly as described and the kids loved using them. I like the telescopic design, this way my kids can adjust their distance when roasting marshmallows to avoid getting burned by the flames. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer G.

customer_reviews.title: Roasting becomes easy!
customer_reviews.text: These barbecue forks are easy to carry in a bag. I think we'll take it with us every time we go camping. Long enough so you don’t have to be close to the fire when fully extended. It's very sturdy, and besides marshmallows we use it to hot dogs, it also works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi C.

customer_reviews.title: These are nice roasting sticks
customer_reviews.text: these were great. I bought this for a party we were having and it was great having so many sticks available. They are very easy to use and have a tote bag. Eight different colors allow each of us to choose our own. It's very sturdy, except for marshmallows, hot dogs and vegetables can also withstand.
customer_reviews.author: ericanorris

customer_reviews.title: Great for smores!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We took these on a weekend trip where we knew we would be doing smores! These were perfect for the kids who were 5-7 in age range, they felt grown up and had a blast! Perfect extension length!
customer_reviews.author: Katie H

customer_reviews.title: No more burnt fingers!!
customer_reviews.text: Got two sets, one for Home and one to keep with the camping equipment. Perfect length to keep your fingers from being burnt! Easy to clean . I really like them as did the family. The case they come in makes it easy to keep them all together and to take anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the colored handles and especially storage case
customer_reviews.text: I like the colored handles so the kids know which stick is theirs. I love the storage bag for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even my 3 year old can use this no problem!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Even my 3 year old was able to use this (with our supervision of course) with no problem. Item was not very sturdy and not flimsy at all even when fully extended.
customer_reviews.author: Chisnax

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but work well. not sure how long ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made but work well. not sure how long they will last. These are the same as antennas from old radios with a handle and fork at the end
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my kids to toast marshmallows. When they are fully extended they are not too sturdy. One was broke before we got the fire going. I do like that they have different color rings so the kids knew who's was whose and didn't fight about it.
customer_reviews.author: mommys opinion

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandkids and they loolve picking out favorite color sticks. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Ditty

customer_reviews.title: Initial order had mold on bag
customer_reviews.text: For now will have to give one star. Just received and as another review stated, my bag had mold on it. Returning and reordering. If the new one comes in better, I will change my review.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA

customer_reviews.title: Love the different colors and knowing who's is who's.
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for our camping trip. They slide in and out to get longer and shorter. I like the different colors to know who's is who's.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T Weaver

customer_reviews.title: I like them, and I love how easily portable they ...
customer_reviews.text: The prongs are not long enough to put a hot dog on long ways, but if you cook one at a time and skewer it across both prongs (perpendicular to the rod) it works. I like them, and I love how easily portable they are. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Benavidez

customer_reviews.title: Roasting stick disconnected from the holder.
customer_reviews.text: One of the forked roasting sticks pulled out of the casing when I pulled a marshmallow from it. CHEAPLY made product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Long!
customer_reviews.text: This roasting sticks very sturdily and long. It's easy to use and easy to roast/toast perfect hot dogs and marshmallows. Telescoping design so they are perfectly safe for little hands who want to roast their own! These are great, especially for my family!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Churchh

customer_reviews.title: Work great when used as intended.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great set, most of them on here are the same product just rebranded but these work great for their intended use. They arrived packaged well and in time for a quick overnight camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be of great quality. I love that these are color coded ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of great quality. I love that these are color coded so everyone can have their own, and you can easily determine whose is whose.
customer_reviews.author: lnm801

customer_reviews.title: My Grandkids Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use; safe from heating up; make great somemores.
customer_reviews.author: William Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME product!! Just what I was looking for to roast marshmallows. They're great quality, sturdy handle and love that they extend (adjustable which is nice!). Plus they come in an awesome carrying/storage case too. Kids were super excited to use them and I was too! Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact,got the job done
customer_reviews.text: these are perfect for the fire pit. Wish they were a little sturdier, but overall they did the job . I like that they came with a bag to store in.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Parr

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughters birthday party so they could roast marshmallows and they worked great! I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These are alright, for the price. 2 broke with-in the first 30 minutes of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smyth

customer_reviews.title: No more burnt hands!
customer_reviews.text: Super long. Gets a little wiggly when fully extended but not like it's going to break holding a marshmellow
customer_reviews.author: Heather N.

customer_reviews.title: Toasted, Crispy, or Chard.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Wooden handle much more comfortable than holding wire. Love the colors to differentiate who’s is what. Quality item.
customer_reviews.author: SnowWhite@28

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, be careful extending sticks
customer_reviews.text: They work well, but are a little flimsy. When I extended the first stick it pulled right out of the handle and I couldn’t use it anymore, so be careful extending them! Otherwise they work great and are really convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Handy with carrying case but turned color
customer_reviews.text: Super handy in the little carrying case...the only thing is they kind of turn colors after washing them. They sort of look rusted already. But other than that really handy!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Havlick

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT rotate poor quality, poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Returning them today!! Very poorly made. Poor quality. Does NOT rotate! I honestly have bought better from a dollar store. I wouldn't spend more than $5 for the set of 8 and sadly I bought 2 packs of these. Looking for better ones now!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica North

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like they extend and collapse and have a bag to put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great for my family!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my family and the price was great! Shipping was fast!
customer_reviews.author: Crystiana D'Epiro

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: does what it says. and its nice to have the pouch for storage.
customer_reviews.author: D.Bass

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. We use it with our kids to roast marshmallows for smores. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: dcdaigle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for s'mores and came in convenient storage bag so we're not scrounging through the kitchen drawers looking for them.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: just not really sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how they'll last. Feel kind of "middle quality". Not low or flimsy quality, just not really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve E G

customer_reviews.title: like them
customer_reviews.text: Work good and store easy. they do get hot so be careful with little ones
customer_reviews.author: MTRanch

customer_reviews.title: Compact, but durable
customer_reviews.text: These roasting sticks are fantastic. They are very compact, yet when the sticks are completely extended they are still strong enough for roasting over a fire. We love these.
customer_reviews.author: D. G.

customer_reviews.title: These are great! We used them as part of a Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We used them as part of a Christmas s’mores gift set. They extend to a long length and came with a pouch to keep them in.
customer_reviews.author: SarZo

customer_reviews.title: S'mores
customer_reviews.text: Always a solid camping utensil. Broke 3 on the camping trip this summer. not very strong, only would use this for marshmallows. for that they work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jrocktheboat

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: The price was best I found. love that everyone knows their own by the color. only draw back is if fork gets into direct flame of fire it will dinge it. But otherwise extension works great and would recommend product
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Holds multiple hot dogs at full extension without bending too much.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Two pronged
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Two pronged, retractable and sturdy. They also came with a zippered pouch. We used them for the first time tonight to roast hot dogs and marshmallows. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda.Altenhofel

customer_reviews.title: great roasters, a little fragile
customer_reviews.text: roast super well, just be careful because they break easily if you leave them out (as kids do) and another kid walks into them.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky J. Keston

product_meta.title: Aoocan marshmallow roasting sticks Telescoping Rotating Smores Skewers Hot Dog - 32 inches - Set of 8 smores sticks for fire pit, Campfire, Camping, Bonfire and Grill
feature_bullets: SAFE FOR CHILDREN: With these extending 32 inch Marshmallow Roasting Sticks, you can ensure that your child is always at a safe distance from fire, while roasting Marshmallows and hot dogs. Also, these multi-colored smores sticks have NON-SHARP tips, to prevent children from being injured.

PREMIUM QUALITY, UNIQUE DESIGN - These Marshmallow Roasting Sticks are made of Non-Toxic Heat-Treated 304 Stainless Steel. They are very easy to clean! The wooden handles with different color coding, which helps keep track for the kids or adults. We created the perfect distance between the prongs for best roasting results.

SET OF 8 HIGHEST QUALITY 34-INCH EXTENDABLE MARSHMALLOW ROASTING STICKS: Stainless Steel metal, non-toxic forks ensure no rusting & safe roasting. This telescoping retracting fork design is convenient for camping trips, fishing trips, backpacking, or home storage. The set also includes a free portable bag.

BONDING EXPERIENCE AND QUALITY TIME - Ideal for making the perfect smores, sausages, wieners, hot dogs and even vegetables or fruits, allow your family to roast these around the campfire together. With The unique design of your new Telescoping Skewers, you will find out how to roast your marshmallows just right, every time! So, if you and your family love Marshmallows and s'mores, those Telescoping Skewers are just for you!

BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE! LIFETIME GUARANTEE! - Our primary goal is to make our customers 100% happy. That is why your new Marshmallow Roasting Sticks come with 100% warranty, for peace of mind. Anytime family is dedicated to addressing any service and product issues. If you're not satisfied with the performance of your roasting forks, we will refund your money or replace it for you, no questions asked!
